channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: General XenForo discussion may go in here

item.title: XenForo
item.author: invalid@example.com (Blake M)
item.dc:creator: Blake M
item.content:encoded:
Hello, so i am new to XenForo, i am about to purchase a license actually very soon! I have been going through themes, audentio and pixelexit themes to be precise, both makers really good. But i love PixelExit themes a bit more! I have been wanting to start a gaming "clan" or "guild" as you may know it! So far i love XenForo for a forum structure and love PixelExit themes! A ton of the themes will actually fit with the clans image! Thats why i love pixel exit!

Both of you made it so hard for...

XenForo

item.title: Next XenBase Update (Preview)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone I like to check in if it has been too long since our last update. We've been working on a nice new update for everything and here's some of the things going into it.

New option to adjust the nav height while floating. Depending on your navigation it may require additional edits but we'll be here to help.
View attachment 5023

New Off-Canvas Sidebar option
View attachment 5024

I've completely recoded the social logins to better and consistent styling. One of...

Next XenBase Update (Preview)

item.title: User markup in last post - forum view
item.author: invalid@example.com (bosss)
item.dc:creator: bosss
item.content:encoded:
Have you some tutorial or add-on (mean to buy) for get usernames markups on forum view - like is here on your site?

regards

bosss

item.title: XenForo 2.0 - Thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (Steve)
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.content:encoded:
Since the public demo has been posted for XF 2.0 we might as well get some thoughts from our users on how you see it.

My first impression is positive, not so much with the default style itself but I'm not to overly concerned with looks so long as no bugs are present. Looking at the structure it looks rather easy to get along with and in most case seems easier to work with from what I've done within Chrome inspector.

So, what are your guys'...

XenForo 2.0 - Thread

item.title: Any new styles coming up soon?
item.author: invalid@example.com (chojo)
item.dc:creator: chojo
item.content:encoded:
All in the title !

Just trying to steal Sherlock Holmes's job you know

item.title: Will the GE theme be available?
item.author: invalid@example.com (WoodiE)
item.dc:creator: WoodiE
item.content:encoded:
@Russ and @Steve, just curious if the GamerExit.com theme will be available for sale anytime? Love the look, the lights on and off options, and ease of use.

I know I'd be a guaranteed customer.

item.title: XenBase
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neal)
item.dc:creator: Neal
item.content:encoded: I actually like the way XenBase as a style looks. Can it be used as the main style, or will it cause some issues, etc. with certain site functions?

item.title: Vacation Notice...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Just as a heads up for everyone, I'm going on a little vacation starting tomorrow (August 16th) and will be returning August 22nd. Support will be limited during this time but it appears our latest patch went extremely well with no problems. When I return I'll be officially launching Archon, it's already up for sale but we haven't advertised it at all simply because of my...

Vacation Notice...

item.title: Archon Feedback
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Well 2 years in the making

I'm looking for some solid feedback to push this out for release.

https://pixelexit.com/demo/?theme=Archon

The vertical navigation can also be turned off completely:
View attachment 3654

Please leave any bugs, suggestions and other comments about Archon here. Thank you!

item.title: Xenforo Media Gallery
item.author: invalid@example.com (Redh)
item.dc:creator: Redh
item.content:encoded:
Hey @Russ,

Have you ever considered doing a style for Xenforo Media Gallery? It is so ugly, and feels like a complete misfit for the forums. I love the Xenforo forums, but the media gallery is a huge let down, and I actually regret purchasing it.

Just a thought, I don't know if you can salvage it or not, but if anyone can I know it's you!

item.title: Is it Stupid?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hilltops Sport Group)
item.dc:creator: Hilltops Sport Group
item.content:encoded: Is it stupid of me to ask what store/shop system you use to handle all of your purchases here at PixelExit? I just love the way it looks, reacts and the way the invoices etc are sent out - it really is mind blowing.

item.title: Installing Core1.5.9 Forum Style in New Hostgator Domain
item.author: invalid@example.com (Subk)
item.dc:creator: Subk
item.content:encoded:
I just bought a Core 1.5.9 Forum style, now I want to install it to my newly bought hostgator domain?
Please help.. thanks, Subk

item.title: New Add-on | Thread Reply Notices (Feedback)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Steve)
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.content:encoded:
We needed something here for a few areas that notified some users of important information when replying. @Russ came up with a good idea and so I decided to bring it to life with a bit more than just a couple template edits. What started off as a simple add-on turned into a full blown 'Thread Reply Notices' add-on

You can see it in action in here or here...

New Add-on | Thread Reply Notices (Feedback)

item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Seems like its just a few templates upgrading this time.
Assume there will be no issues upgrading @Russ @Steve ?

Thanks!

item.title: 1.5.8 Status Report
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone,

I wanted to take a quick moment to update everyone on the status of 1.5.8. Normally we wouldn't go this long without an update but I've been working hard on this update with some rather large improvements. The complete change-log is massive and the bulk of it is fine tuning various areas which needed to be done.

Here's a small list of some the things we've been focusing on:
  • Message improvements, this includes a ton of CSS, style property and template clean up...

1.5.8 Status Report
